movesets.name: Defensive

items.name: Eviolite
items.description: Boosts Defense and Special Defense of holder by 50% if it is an NFE Pokemon.

movesets.description:
Moves

Will-O-Wisp is Koffing's key to bringing down physical attackers and is perhaps the most important move in its arsenal. Pain Split is Koffing's only means of recovery. Though unreliable, it not only heals Koffing, but damages the opponent as well. Sludge Bomb is a STAB attack that can deal decent chunks of damage and has a nice 30% chance to poison the opposing Pokemon. Clear Smog is an possible option over Sludge Bomb if you want Koffing to be able to stop setup sweepers from getting out of control, though its effect will not activate if the opponent has a Substitute up. Fire Blast is primarily for hitting the Steel-types that are immune to Koffing's STAB move; it lands a powerful hit on Pawniard and nails Ferroseed especially hard. Destiny Bond lets Koffing take a foe down with it when it is KOed by a direct attack. It's mostly a last-ditch attempt to get rid of a troublesome enemy.

Set Details

An Eviolite, with the given EV spread, gives Koffing an effective Defense stat of 30. This allows Koffing to tank physical hits well. Apart from maxing out Defense, the remaining EVs contribute to Koffing's special bulk so that it can survive stray neutral special hits more easily. Fewer EVs are invested in HP so that Pain Split takes more health from the opponent. Levitate rids Koffing of its would-be Ground-type weakness, except for when facing an opponent with Mold Breaker and Earthquake.

Usage Tips

Koffing can switch in comfortably against Bug-, Fairy-, Ground-, and Fighting-type foes and can force most physical attackers out with the threat of Will-O-Wisp. A warning to the wise: do not use Will-O-Wisp on Timburr. Most Timburr run Guts, which will boost its Attack and help it deal more damage. Pain Split can be used at lower health against enemies with higher health to damage them while also recovering HP; Koffing's low Speed can come in handy for this move in particular, as it lets the opponent take away some of its health before stealing it back with Pain Split. Destiny Bond can be used to make the opponent reconsider delivering a fatal blow. This looming threat often keeps foes from attacking a low Koffing, providing an opportunity to recover with Pain Split while they hesitate.

Team Options

Koffing's main goal is to neutralize Fighting-type threats. Because of this, teammates that have problems with Fighting-types enjoy the support that Koffing provides. Koffing appreciates the recovery granted by Wish support, even though it has Pain Split; Lickitung makes a particularly good partner for this purpose, as Koffing can shrug off the Fighting-type attacks aimed at Lickitung, while its Wish recovery can be provided to both of them. Scraggy makes an ideal partner that covers Koffing's sole weakness to Psychic-type attacks, and Koffing tanks the Fighting-type attacks aimed at Scraggy. Other Dark-types, such as Zorua and Purrloin, love having Koffing as a partner, as it resists all of their weaknesses. Other Dark-types such as Vullaby and Pawniard appreciate this coverage too, but to a lesser extent, as their second type neutralizes some of these resistances. Chinchou makes a good partner for dealing with Tentacool, which resists Koffing's STAB move and Fire Blast rather easily. Entry hazard setters like Dwebble and Ferroseed can be ideal partners, as Koffing can force switches which rack up residual damage quite nicely.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: Base Power doubles if the foe takes damage in the same turn, before the attack hits.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: Targets of the opposite gender are infatuated and have a 50% chance to do nothing.

moves.name: Belch
moves.description: The user must eat a Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: Lowers an opposite gender foe's Special Attack by 2 stages.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.description: Eliminates the target's stat changes.

moves.name: Confide
moves.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: Does 1/4 of max HP damage per turn at the cost of half the user's max HP if the user is a Ghost. Boosts Attack and Defense and lowers Speed by 1 stage otherwise.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: 20% chance to flinch.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: If the user faints, the foe faints.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: Boosts evasion by 1 stage.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user always survives with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: Faints the user.

moves.name: Facade
moves.description: Has 140 Base Power when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: 10% chance to burn.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: 10% chance to burn.

moves.name: Flash
moves.description: Lowers foe's accuracy 1 stage.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Grudge
moves.description: If the user faints, the foe's attack loses all of its PP.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: Does damage based on the foe's Speed and the user's Speed.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: Eliminates all stat changes.

moves.name: Hidden Power Bug
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Dark
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Dragon
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Electric
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Fighting
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Fire
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Flying
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Ghost
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Grass
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Ground
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Ice
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Poison
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Psychic
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Rock
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Steel
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Water
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.description: Removes the target's Berry.

moves.name: Infestation
moves.description: Traps and damages target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Memento
moves.description: User faints. Lowers foe's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.description: Copies the last move used by the target.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: Power and type depends on the user's held Berry.

moves.name: Pain Split
moves.description: Averages both Pokemon's HP.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: Base Power doubles if the foe has taken its turn.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: Poisons the target.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: Prevents anything from working on the user that turn.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: 10% chance to confuse.

moves.name: Psywave
moves.description: Does random damage equal to .5x-1.5x the user's level.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: Summons rain for 5 turns.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns and restores all HP.

moves.name: Return
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: Doubles in power with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

moves.name: Round
moves.description: Power doubles if a teammate uses Round in the same turn.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: Lowers foe's Defense by 2 stages.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.description: Effects vary with terrain.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.description: Faints the user.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: 20% chance to lower Special Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.description: Ignores accuracy modifiers.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.description: Picks one of the user's moves at random. Can only be used while sleeping.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.description: 30% chance to poison.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.description: 30% chance to poison.

moves.name: Sludge Wave
moves.description: 10% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Smog
moves.description: 40% chance to poison.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: Lowers foe's accuracy by 1 stage.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: Can only be used while sleeping. 30% chance to flinch.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.description: Varies in power depending on the number of uses of Stockpile.

moves.name: Spite
moves.description: Lowers the PP of the move used last by 1-5.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: Sets the user up to use Spit Up and Swallow.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: Takes 1/4 the user's max HP to create a Substitute that takes damage for the user.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: Summons sun for 5 turns.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: Confuses the target. Boosts its Attack by 2 stages.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.description: Healing varies based on the number of uses of Stockpile.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: Forces the foe to use damaging moves for 2 turns.

moves.name: Thief
moves.description: Steals target's item.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: 30% chance to paralyze.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: 10% chance to paralyze.

moves.name: Torment
moves.description: Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: Inflicts intensifying poison on the target.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.description: Poisons opponents as they switch switch in.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: Repeats for 2-5 turns. No Pokemon can sleep during these turns.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.description: Hits poisoned targets with double Base Power.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.description: Burns the foe.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type moves.
